name: Impulsive Button
summary:
You've got an impulse to press it, we know you do.. but can you press it in time before it goes red? Lets see if you've got what it takes to have the highest streak! Allow us to introduce, Impulsive Button! Don't mistake these to be easy buttons.

This is a game that will test your timing and speed. Avoid red, and press green.

Features:
-Red buttons
-Almighty Green buttons
-High scores
-Streak stats

Look forward to many more additions in the future! This is only the beginning phase of your test.
